A Grade
Journey of the Lone Wolf
Michael Fowler Centre, Wellington, Wellington Region, New Zealand Grades A - C and Youth on April 21st (Set Work & Hymn) and 22nd (Own Choice)
Best Soloist in Set Work: Tamaryn Heck, Flugelhorn - Brisbane Excelsior Best Section in Set Work: Percussion - Brisbane Excelsior Best Principal Cornet in Own Choice: Jonathan Smith - Woolston Brass
